summary: Diff adds a React hash-routed marketing site skeleton with header/footer, multiple pages, warm amber theme variables, and structured content data for departments/events. However, evidence is missing for required generated static assets being present in public, browser metadata/title updates, centralized site/contact configuration definition, and the required icon sprite asset usage.

missing_requirements.requirement: Browser tab title and visible branding must match the new institution name consistently across header, footer, and metadata; remove any Darshan references; do not hot-link darshan.ac.in assets.
missing_requirements.reason: Header/footer appear to use a new name via siteConfig, but there is no evidence of metadata/browser tab title updates (e.g., index.html/head management) in the diff summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: Centralize new contact details/address in a single frontend configuration object and ensure all contact/address strings source from it.
missing_requirements.reason: Components reference a centralized config (siteConfig), but the actual configuration object/file contents are not shown/added in the diff summary, and the footer contact section is truncated so it cannot be verified that all contact details are sourced from config.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add generated static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated (logo/wordmark, hero/banner illustration, and required icon sprite) and reference them from the frontend.
missing_requirements.reason: Code references the wordmark and hero image paths, but the diff summary does not show any files added under frontend/public/assets/generated, and there is no evidence of the required monochrome icon sprite being added or used.

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity authentication scaffolding and React Query setup for a marketing site.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest states authentication is not required for this marketing site (though II is supported). The diff adds an InternetIdentityProvider, useActor hook, and React Query client even though no marketing-site requirements call for auth/actor usage.

hallucinated_features.description: Client-side contact form submission UX using alert().
hallucinated_features.reason: REQs do not request a contact inquiry form or any submission behavior; the page includes a non-submitting form handler that triggers an alert.
